posts.post_content:
*"So, obviously followed footsteps + reaper king = game end."*  
-Donovan\_Fabian  
  
Maybe if you're playing Followed Footsteps on your opponent's Reaper King.Not a good idea for your own Reaper King-- Reaper King's legendary, so if two or more are in play, they all go to the graveyard due to the "legend rule." So much for that multiple-Reaper-King fantasy... unless you've got [Mirror Gallery](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirror Gallery) out.

Posted By: ddemons (4/29/2012 11:08:04 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Hanna's Custody](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hanna's Custody) offers good protection, it's a fairly cheap way of protecting him 'cause Darksteel is not only mana expensive but can screw you if someone's running [Viashino Heretic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viashino Heretic).  
  
As many ppl have mentioned, great in EDH when he's out... IF he stays out, 'cause he's like a BIG glass cannon and paints a huge target on his head. I find you need stuff like the Glass spinner creature or Hanna's Custody or countermagic established before you play him, because you pretty much have to assume he won't make it around the table.  
  
IF I can pull it off in my deck, I like to try to establish either Ghostaway + Witness or Kiki-Jiki + Mystic Snake (or both) on the board before I drop him. Crystal Shard is good too if you run a lot of CIP effects like I do. Great General, but to really make him work requires more protection and less combo.
posts.html:
Hanna's Custody offers good protection, it's a fairly cheap way of protecting him 'cause Darksteel is not only mana expensive but can screw you if someone's running Viashino Heretic.

As many ppl have mentioned, great in EDH when he's out... IF he stays out, 'cause he's like a BIG glass cannon and paints a huge target on his head. I find you need stuff like the Glass spinner creature or Hanna's Custody or countermagic established before you play him, because you pretty much have to assume he won't make it around the table.

IF I can pull it off in my deck, I like to try to establish either Ghostaway + Witness or Kiki-Jiki + Mystic Snake (or both) on the board before I drop him. Crystal Shard is good too if you run a lot of CIP effects like I do. Great General, but to really make him work requires more protection and less combo.
